author: AirPano VR
description:
Don't forget that this is 360 video: you can change the angle of view. 

The Kuril Islands are truly a "rugged volcanic region" due to their location on the boundary of two tectonic plates that form the Pacific Ring of Fire. They are home to a large number of both above-water (approximately 68) and underwater volcanoes, many of which are active, creating an active landscape and frequent displays of volcanic activity, including hot springs and fumarole fields.

If you enjoyed this video please like, share, comment, favorite, subscribe: https://goo.gl/NZMdaz 
We regularly publish new 360 videos of the most beautiful places on our planet!

360° photos and videos, stories of our shootings, articles and FAQ you can find on our website: http://AirPano.com

Nowadays you need extraordinary computer power for watching 8K 360° videos. If you have troubles with watching such videos, choose 4K or HD quality in the settings of your YouTube player. We hope that YouTube will find a solution for opti
title: Kuril Islands. VR Relaxation in 16K
